Traits.Name: Viral Load
Traits.Content: When a creature is hit by the virus’s natural attack or starts its turn in the virus’s Aerosol Aura (10 ft., DC 12), it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it gains 1 Viral Load (maximum of 3 or 4 depending on tier). Each stack reduces attack rolls and checks by 1, and at 3 stacks, the target is poisoned and cannot regain hit points until the end of its next turn. A successful save removes 1 stack at the end of the creature's turn. All magical disease cures remove all stacks.

Traits.Name: Coiling Lash
Traits.Content: The Macro-virus can use its tendrils to grapple. If it successfully hits a target, the target must make a Strength saving throw (DC 13) or be grappled and restrained. The escape DC is also 13.

Actions.Name: Coiling Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 21 (5d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. On hit, the target must make a Strength saving throw (DC 13) or be grappled and restrained until it escapes.

Actions.Name: Whip-Around
Actions.Content: The Macro-virus unleashes a sudden burst of viral energy in a 10-ft radius. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 13). On a failure, a creature takes 14 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage and gains 1 Viral Load. On a success, a creature takes half damage and doesn't gain Viral Load. Additionally, failed targets are pushed back 10 feet.
